headline: ACORE CAPITAL Announces Closing of $1.1 Billion Commercial Real Estate CLO
summary: NEW YORK, February 23, 2026--ACORE CAPITAL, one of the leading U.S. commercial real estate investment managers, today announced the closing of ACORE 2026-FL1, a $1.1 billion managed commercial real estate collateralized loan obligation (CRE CLO). The CRE CLO’s initial collateral pool consists of 22 loans secured primarily by multifamily and industrial properties. The sponsor of the transaction is ACORE Credit Partners II REIT, Inc.
